'''1.21.7''' is a minor hotfix update to {{JE}} released on June 30, 2025<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-java-edition-1-21-7|Minecraft Java Edition 1.21.7|June 30, 2025}}</ref>, which adds a new [[music disc]] and [[painting]] referencing {{AMCM}}, and fixes some critical issues from [[Java Edition 1.21.6|1.21.6]].<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-21-7-release-candidate-1|Minecraft 1.21.7 Release Candidate 1|June 25, 2025}}</ref> It is not compatible with 1.21.6 servers.

== Additions ==
{{Additions table|Music Disc Lava Chicken|Painting Dennis}}
=== Items ===
'''[[Music disc]]'''
* [[File:Music Disc Lava Chicken JE1 BE1.png|32px]] Added the [[Music Disc Lava Chicken|"Lava Chicken" music disc]] by [[Hyper Potions]].
** Obtained by killing a [[baby zombie]] while it is riding a [[chicken]] (a [[chicken jockey]]).
*** If the chicken is killed before the zombie is, the music disc is not dropped.
** Has a [[comparator]] output of 9 when played in a [[jukebox]].

''' [[Painting]]s '''
* Added a new painting by [[Sarah Boeving]]:

!class="unsortable" scope="col"|Picture
!Name!!Size!!Artist

|style="text-align:center;"|[[File:Dennis (texture) JE1 BE1.png|128px]]

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''[[Data pack]]'''
* The [[pack format]] version is now {{cd|81}}.

'''[[Resource pack]]'''
* The [[pack format]] version is now {{cd|64}}.

'''[[Tag (Java Edition)|Tags]]'''
* Added {{cd|dennis}} to {{cd|#placeable}} painting variant tag.

== Trivia ==
* 1.21.7 is the first ''Java Edition'' 1.x.7 release since [[Java Edition 1.8.7|1.8.7]], which released in 2015.
* 1.21.7 is the first update without snapshots to add blocks or items to the game since [[Java Edition 1.2.4|1.2.4]].
